tool_description: SEM / SEO keyword Statistics to generate Google search request, keyword competition, and CPC Cost-Per-Click ($).
name: SEM Keyword Stats
title: SEM Keyword Stats

api_list.name: Keyword Stats Retrieval
api_list.description: This endpoint will allow you to retrieve: Monthly Search Volume, CPC ($), and Competition Rating.

required_parameters.name: keyword
required_parameters.description: Use any keyword you would like in order to extract real-time SEM keyword statistics on search volume, competition, and keyword CPC.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sem.p.rapidapi.com/?keywords=seo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sem.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sem.p.rapidapi.com/?keywords={keyword}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sem.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
